nodes.text: An Imperial Recruitment Poster was a poster made sometime after the Battle of Yavin. It was a recruitment poster requesting youths to join the Imperial Military, with a stormtrooper at the front and Aurebesh writing. It was often sold during Empire Day festivities, although they sometimes ended up vandalized by Rebel sympathizers.
The Imperial Recruitment Poster was sold during Empire Day festivities for 20x Empire Day tokens prior to Star Wars Galaxies closure on December 15, 2011.
